senses.sense_definition: A rash caused by blocked, malfunctioning, or underdeveloped sweat glands.

examples.text: The dermatologist diagnosed the patient with <w>miliaria</w> after examining the small, itchy bumps on his skin.
Infants in tropical climates are often susceptible to <w>miliaria</w> because their sweat ducts are not yet fully developed.
